channel.title: St. Flash's Day
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "St. Flash's Day" - Added!

item.title: Re: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded: i can say right now that hanging out with bruce jr. via friend levels takes a hell of a time. Even with a bruce-tictac-diddy team and The Ninja-Mas Spirit jutsu (as a legacy sp.jonin) i could only get 12k points per day and spent 5 days farming d-ranks to get him to hang out. if u can, i highly advise u to either use a make out mood enhancer or try getting the love love paradise item

item.title: Re: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded:
It's be nice if, instead of reviving an old thread, if you could have possibly started a new thread, in the Missions section instead of the General section, to ask this question.

As for the answer though, it said "I am Hanging Out with Bruce Jr," not "Bruce Jr. is in my team," meaning that you have to be Hanging Out with Bruce Jr. for that part of the mission. You can do this by having the most friend points with Bruce Jr. at the dayroll, by having Bruce Jr. in your team and the theme Floating On Air active at Dayroll, or by having Bruce Jr. as the only person on your team and using a Make-Out Mood Enhancer.

item.title: Re: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded: had needed items asked if i was with bruce jr and still failed what happened

item.title: Re: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded: Also of note: two Stark Moonlights mixed while in Bankai make a Make-Out Mood Enhancer, which lets you Hang Out with someone if they're the only person in your team. I'm sure you can see the applications of this for the St. Flash mission.

item.title: Re: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded:
It's also worth noting that if you have Nadeshiko's theme and you can do a Jonin Level girl power team and get +2 strength/+2 range on top of that. In addition, getting +20 friend points for each mission would greatly speed up the process of getting to Hanging out with females.

It'll be interesting to see what the updated ring will be.

item.title: Re: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded: I pulled two off one ingredient hunt, but that char's a S. Jonin and got two extra item pulls from village upgrades.

item.title: Re: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded: well Im in MC's hole right now so I can't do that mission for another couple daysâ€¦ Is it easy to find sham rocks?

item.title: Re: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded:
The Running Man Jutsu is pretty nice. +1 range, 20x friend points in any Girl Power team for 200 chakra. If you're in a village with a Jutsu Enhancement Tower, you can knock it down to 100 chakra, and then with a Chakra Training Center you can knock off another -10%. Good teaming will also make that less, and will get you some other benefits (ie: Pinky/Stalkergirl/Rover's Mom gets you the aforementioned Girl Power bonus, +1 range, -15% chakra costs, +1 stamina per mission. Make that Pinky Lvl 2 and Stalkergirl Lvl 2 for extra awesome).

I plan on going with the team I just mentioned and spamming the Running Man Jutsu. I think using it repeatedly will make the Flash Ring do something different.

item.title: Re: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded: -10 stamina a day? is it worth it?

item.title: St. Flash's Day
item.content:encoded: St. Flash's Day, the Flash Ring, and The Running Man Jutsu are all added. Check for errors, add failure messages please!
